channel.title: Status List Won't Work
channel.description:
I've Portforwarded, checked UDP & TCP both open on 43594, register server onto moparscape ( whilst server is online running ), and then it says this server is offline, help?
PRODLEM RESOVLED - KEEP YOUR SERVER ON FOR ATLEAST 10-20 MINUTES.
Regards, James

item.title: Status List Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“xEvo, post:2, topic:346467”][quote author=James-RevolutionX link=topic=442849.msg3252025#msg3252025 date=1277836316]
I’ve Portforwarded, checked UDP & TCP both open on 43594, register server onto moparscape ( whilst server is online running ), and then it says this server is offline, help?

Regards,
James
[/quote]

I believe you ONLY need TCP open.[/quote]

You still need both somtimes

Read full topic

item.title: Status List Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

You probably have a firewall blocking the port then.
